casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

October, 1953.

(October 1, 1953.) In the Matter of the Guardianship of Gerald L. Procopio, an Infant.

Order affirmed, without costs of this appeal to any party. All concur. (Appeal from an order appointing a general guardian of the person of an infant.) Present — McCurn, P. J., Vaughan, Kimball, Piper and Wheeler, JJ.
